attributes.action: Make housing for BME (Black Minority Ethnic) groups illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Providing housing for particular racial groups is discriminatory and in the case of BME Housing is racist against White people.  It would certainly be considered racist if an organisation stated that it would provide White Housing.  The government should either make it illegal for BME Housing organisations to operate or it should state very clearly that it is okay for a 'White' Housing organisation to operate.
